account_email.notice: Vinovest uses this email address to contact you with important information regarding the status of your account. Please keep it current.

account_investment_plan.notice: Note: Your investment plan determines the blend of investments your money is allocated to. It will only affect future investments and will not re-balance your current positions.

disclaimer: All of your information is secured. We will never send your data to marketers or send you spam

onboard.error_create_account: Unable to create an account at this time. Please contact customer support for help.
onboard.error_password_email_new_user: Unable to register new user due to invalid email or password. Please use an email that is not already registered with Vinovest, and set a password that meets the criteria.
onboard.label_referal: How did you hear about us? (optional)

password.current_password: Current password is incorrect. This is required to update your password.
password.error_characters: Password should contain at least 8 characters
password.error_number: Password should contain at least one number
password.error_special: Password should contain at least one special character
password.error_upper: Password should contain at least one uppercase character
password.notice: To change your password, enter your current password and then create a new one using the following form.
password.password_requirements: At least 8 characters one number one uppercase letter and one special character

profile.label_cash_access: When are you planning to invest?
profile.label_starting_investment: How much are you planning to invest in your first year?

rebalance_description: To speak with an advisor about rebalancing your portfolio, please schedule a call using the link below.

description.description: Please allow 2-4 weeks for the process to be completed.
description.paragraph1: If you are choosing to sell before the recommended selling window, please be aware that you may not making the most strategic investment decision. Selling within the first three years of your investment is detrimental in two key ways:
description.paragraph2: 1. You are still in the window of being charged an early liquidation penalty.
description.paragraph3: 2. You will forfeit any future gains from the winesâ€™ price appreciation.
description.paragraph4: Historical data shows that the strongest returns are realized over a 5 to 20 year time frame.
description.portfolio_sold: We have received your request to sell your entire wine portfolio.
description.sell_portfolio: If you would like to liquidate and or withdraw your funds, please click the button below.

liquidation.neither: If you would like to liquidate and or withdraw your funds, please click the button below.
liquidation.partial: We have received your request to sell some of your wines.
